serviceArea: Central Illinois - Peoria, Springfield, Bloomington, Champaign, and surrounding areas
shortDescription: Creative photography & design studio specializing in weddings, engagements, family portraits, and graphic design. 6+ years experience. Serving Central Illinois.
longDescription: In Design by Kristina is a creative studio founded by Kristina Velpel, specializing in photography, videography, and graphic design. With over 6 years of experience and 15+ events covered, the studio is built on a passion for capturing once-in-a-lifetime moments and transforming them into photos you'll treasure forever. Services include wedding photography, engagement sessions, couple sessions, family portraits, individual/portrait sessions, senior photos, and custom graphic design including logo design. Known for artistic compositions and attention to detail, Kristina brings a warm, personable approach to every shoot, ensuring clients feel comfortable and confident. The studio serves Central Illinois including Peoria, Springfield, Bloomington, and Champaign areas.
